Description: 2-year period during which survey data were collected
General demographic category under which responses have been stratified
All ages, 0-17 years, 18+ years, 0-4 years, 5-17 years, 18-64 years, and 65+ years
Estimate of the percentage of people who report that they have ever been diagnosed with asthma AND that they still have asthma at the time of the survey (source: CHIS)

The current prevalence estimate is calculated from survey respondents (who represent a sample of the population) and may not reflect the true current prevalence for the entire population. This 95% confidence interval is the range of values which contains the  popuation's actual current prevalence with 95% certainty.
Warning provided when prevalence estimate is statistically unstable (standard error is 30-50% of prevalence estimate). Data suppressed when standard error exceeds 50% of prevalence estimate.
